SELECT tu.id, tu.nickname AS nickName, tu.head_img_url AS headImage
, CASE tgu.user_class WHEN '1' THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS isLeader
FROM t_user tu
, t_group_user tgu WHERE tu.id = tgu.user_id_fk

SELECT tu.id, tu.nickname AS nickName, tu.head_img_url AS headImage, user_group.totalGroup, user_book.totalRead, user_remark.totalRemark FROM t_user tu LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tu.id, COUNT(*) AS totalGroup FROM t_user tu, t_group_user tgu WHERE tu.id = tgu.user_id_fk GROUP BY tu.id ) AS user_group ON tu.id = user_group.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tu.id, COUNT(*) AS totalRead FROM t_user tu, t_group_user tgu WHERE tu.id = tgu.user_id_fk AND tgu.user_status = 2 GROUP BY tu.id ) AS user_book ON tu.id = user_book.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tu.id, COUNT(*) AS totalRemark FROM t_user tu, t_remark tr WHERE tu.id = tr.user_id_fk GROUP BY tu.id ) AS user_remark ON tu.id = user_remark.id
WHERE tu.id = ${userId}
